meta.name: description
meta.content: Bergen New Bridge Medical Center, a clinical affiliate of Rutgers Biomedical and Health Sciences, is a 1,070-bed hospital located at 230 East Ridgewood Avenue in Paramus, NJ.

h3.a: COVID-19 Screening and Antibody Testing at Bergen New Bridge

div.p: Symptomatic Testing by Appointment Only. For Bergen County first responders, Bergen County hospital employees, symptomatic Bergen County residents, and employees of either the County or

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-5306 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-uncategorized entry has-media

h3.a: Show Support for Our Healthcare Heroes

div.p: Purchase a lawn sign for $20. Proceeds from the sale will go to The Foundation’s Supporting Our Services (SOS) campaign. For lawn sign local delivery arrangements:Contact RoseMary

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-5239 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-events category-news entry has-media

h3.a: Telehealth Services Now Include Mental Health

div.p: To best serve the needs of our community during COVID-19, we are pleased to announce our Telehealth services now includes mental health. Connect with our

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-5102 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news tag-covid19 entry has-media

h3.a: Worried about Coronavirus? Telehealth can help.

div.p: There’s no need to leave your house and risk further exposure. With the spread of coronavirus (COVID-19), it’s important to seek the appropriate care. If you

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-5104 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news tag-covid19 entry has-media

div.p: Effective immediately, Bergen New Bridge Medical Center has suspended visitation until further notice. The situation surrounding COVID-19 (novel coronavirus) continues to evolve and changes occur quickly.
